name: Battle Royale: Nokia 3310 Edition
description:
Controls: arrows or WASD move. Q or E shoot.
Tip: Walk into the chests to pick up different guns, heal life and gain shield.
Tip 2: There are 3 difficulties that increase as you win the matches. Try to beat them all!



I got so excited with the jam that I make this game before I know that would be a theme. I made this one in exactly 4 days too, but since it doesn't really mach with the theme, I made another game. Anyways, I think this one is really good and fun so I wanted to show to you guys. Have fun!
